title: Rolling Stones: time is on our side
brief_description: Video recording of the Rolling Stones performing at the Sun Devil Stadium, Arizona State University, Arizona, as part of their American Tour 81. Includes some of their most popular songs but the performance is probably not one of their best and the recording is of inconsistent quality.
